Description: ***Free shipping to lower 48 USA ***Lower 48 USA shipping only ***No international shipping The Heavy Machine offers the perfect balance of heavy 70's rock fuzz and early heavy metal distortion. It's stocked with Mountainking's signature three control filter circuit for true spectral control. Capable of everything from ripping leads to heavy crushing riffs and deep scooped mids to edgy attacks. Works great with both guitar and bass! All Mountainking devices have controls that allow for a wide range of sonic possibilities. We encourage you to visit the HEAVY MACHINE page on our website and read over the manual for a full understanding of the function and effect of its controls. FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS: 100% handmade original discrete circuit design hand selected transistors true bypass switching top mounted input, output and power jack can be powered by 9v battery or 9v dc power adapter dimensions 4.7"(W) x 3.7"(D) x 1.18" (H) current consumption 0.57 ma max.
